name: Datafree Limited
description: Developer of data-free connection technology and platform built to remove the data cost barrier and increase user engagement. The company's platform uses a reverse billing model that enables us to deliver content from websites, applications, and dedicated IP addresses to users at no mobile data cost to them, even with no airtime or data balance, enabling clients to ensure seamless internal communication, client outreach, member connection, and commercial publishing.
one_liner: Developer of data-free connection technology and platform built to remove the data cost barrier and increase user engagement. The company's platform uses a reverse billing model that enables us to deliver content from websites, applications, and dedicated IP addresses to users at no mobile data cost to them, even with no airtime or data balance, enabling clients to ensure seamless internal communication, client outreach, member connection, and commercial publishing.
